dmca.title: rademark Infringement by buzybodiesstlouis.com
dmca.body:
t

________________________________

From: Scott Phillips [mailto:SPhillips@renegadepartswashers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, January 25, 2007 10:55 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Trademark Infringement by buzybodiesstlouis.com


I am writing on behalf of Service Line, Inc. ("Service Line"). Service
Line has used the trade name and service mark RENEGADE consistently,
extensively, and prominently in interstate commerce since at least as
early as December 31, 1998, in connection with selling and promoting
their goods, namely, washing machines for industrial parts and pressure
washing machines. Service Line has developed extensive public
recognition as well as having acquired substantial goodwill in RENEGADE
and related marks. As the owner of the above trademarks, Service Line
has an obligation to police the market and prevent unauthorized use of
its trademarks. Otherwise, it runs the risk of losing its rights to its
trademarks. Therefore, Service Line will actively pursue anyone who
misuses its valuable trademark rights.

It has recently come to our attention that you are hosting a domain
(buzybodiesstlouis.com) that has been using the RENEGADE mark in their
internet pages in order to draw potential consumers to their site
through initial interest confusion.

The web page is located at:
http://www.buzybodiesstlouis.com/x_file_movie/renegade_part_washer.html

Their use is a clear infringement of our trademarks, and our exclusive
right to use such marks. We consider Their use of the identical mark in
connection with closely related goods to be an attempt to trade on the
very extensive and valuable good will which Service Line has developed
in their well-known mark. These actions misappropriate the RENEGADE
trademark, represent a significant infringement of Service Line's
valuable trademark rights, and diminish our customer's capacity to
identify and distinguish our goods and services on the Internet. As
such, we insist that you immediately, but ultimately not later than two
days after the date of this communication, have your client remove the
web page referenced above, and cease and desist using the RENEGADE mark
or any other confusingly similar marks on the advertising and/or any
websites that they operate.

This letter is sent without prejudice to all rights of Service Line,
including past or future royalties, past or future damages, attorney's
fees, and to bring enforcement actions for all past or future violations
of Service Line's rights.

Should you have any questions concerning Service Line's position in this
matter, please do not hesitate to contact me.

A similar notification was sent to buzybodiesstlouis.com notifying them
of our intentent.

Sincerely,
Scott Phillips
Renegade Parts Washers
800-774-7900
